lead_paragraph: Karl, 33-49 in his first full season with Sacramento, could not improve the team’s defense and clashed with the star center DeMarcus Cousins.

headline.print_headline: Unable to End Kings’ Woes, Karl Is Fired
headline.main: Unable to End Kings’ Woes, George Karl Is Fired

snippet: Karl, 33-49 in his first full season with Sacramento, could not improve the team’s defense and clashed with the star center DeMarcus Cousins.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Sacramento Kings fire coach George Karl after team finishes with 33-49 record; other basketball news noted.
